entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
